address2: 12th Floor, North Wing No. 2 Kexuiyuan Nanlu Haidian District
longBusinessSummary: Chinasoft International Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in development and provision of information technology (IT) solutions, IT outsourcing, and training services in the People's Republic of China, the United States, Malaysia, Japan, India, Saudi Arabia, and internationally. It operates through Technical Professional Services Group and Internet IT Services Group segments. The company offers CloudEasy, a cloud management platform; Huaxia Cloud Network, a cloud brokerage platform; Tencent Cloud; Cloud Operations Platform; Cloud Application Platform; Content Collaboration Platform; Knowledge Management System; Speed Desktop for cloud desktop; and Enterprise Cloud Disk. It also engages in big data business in the government, transportation, telecom, energy, and manufacturing industries; ERNIE Bot, an AI application; intelligent cloud solutions, including intelligent finance, automobile, transportation, regulation, park, and office solutions; digital transformation solutions, comprising IT consulting, enterprise application software, and software factory solutions; and Jointforce, an industrial internet platform. In addition, the company offers software and technology services in finance, telecommunications, internet, hi-technology, and energy sectors; human resource outsourcing services; and IT application development and maintenance services, IT testing services, infrastructure management services, product research and development and services, digital consulting and implementation services, system integration and services, and outsourcing services. Chinasoft International Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Leung Chai  Leong
